info.gridworld.maze

Class MazeBug

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.actor.Actor
      • info.gridworld.actor.Bug
        • info.gridworld.maze.MazeBug

  • public class MazeBug
extends Bug
    A MyMazeBug can find its way in a maze.
    The implementation of this class is testable on the AP CS A and AB exams.
